item.title: Rails partial views and locals variables
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: Partial views get used in most web frameworks. In Rails and most other frameworks you can pass local variables to your partials. This is how I learned that in Rails these locals are instance methods and not instance variables.
